title: LAIR / INSTIGATOR CASE
description: Here you can present your case to Ruby and find yourself left without much of a case.

dialogueTree.title: You: ""Would you say that Lely was... a *..."
dialogueTree.text: "Would you say that Lely was... a *likeable* person?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I didn't like him. Hardened mercen..."
links.text: "I didn't like him. Hardened mercenaries aren't particularly likeable types."

links.title: You: ""You don't feel... sympathy for mer..."
links.text: "You don't feel... sympathy for mercs? It's hard work."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Plenty of broken people who don't..."
links.text: "Plenty of broken people who don't come with that kind of body count. Besides, they're paid well for what they do."

links.title: You: ""There's nothing more... personal t..."
links.text: "There's nothing more... personal that you had against him? Perhaps his... way with women?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""You think I was envious of his con..."
links.text: "You think I was envious of his conquests? Look, pussy's not a problem for me. And definitely not a reason to off someone."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "See her confident gaze, her toned a..."
links.text: See her confident gaze, her toned arms -- yeah, she wouldn't have had much trouble in the intimacy department.

links.title: You: ""Did you feel... protective of the..."
links.text: "Did you feel... protective of the Union?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yeah, sure, and I didn't like Wild..."
links.text: "Yeah, sure, and I didn't like Wild Pines sending in those foreign hirelings -- me and a fuck-ton of other people around here."

links.title: Drama: "I hate to be the bearer of bad tidi..."
links.text: I hate to be the bearer of bad tidings, but I don't think she's perjuring herself.

links.title: Empathy: "She didn't hate him, okay?"
links.text: She didn't hate him, okay?

links.title: You: ""I have other questions." (Conclude..."
links.text: "I have other questions." (Conclude.)

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I'm listening.""
links.text: "I'm listening."

dialogueTree.title: You: ""Do you have an... alibi? For when..."
dialogueTree.text: "Do you have an... alibi? For when Lely was shot?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Man, I was with the boys the whole..."
links.text: "Man, I was with the boys the whole night. I hope they at least bothered to impress *that* upon you."

links.title: You: ""There were... ten minutes they cou..."
links.text: "There were... ten minutes they couldn't account for."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""You mean, the length of a toilet b..."
links.text: "You mean, the length of a toilet break? That wouldn't even have been enough time."

links.title: You: ""Hold on, *no one* takes a fifteen-..."
links.text: "Hold on, *no one* takes a fifteen-minute leak."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Look, fuck you, man. I might have..."
links.text: "Look, fuck you, man. I might have also stopped by the bar."

links.title: Drama: "She speaketh truth."
links.text: She speaketh truth.

links.title: You: ""Our investigation..." (wince from..."
links.text: "Our investigation..." (wince from the pain) "has shown that fifteen minutes was *just* enough time to commit the murder."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Wow, now I'm curious. Please, expl..."
links.text: "Wow, now I'm curious. Please, explain."

links.title: You: ""Play... pinball much?""
links.text: "Play... pinball much?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""No, not since I was 14 and hanging..."
links.text: "No, not since I was 14 and hanging out at the only diner in Dardanne. Haven't been into low-risk, no-reward games since moving to the city."

links.title: Shivers: "Somewhere on the outskirts of Faubo..."
links.text: Somewhere on the outskirts of Faubourg, a scrawny teenage girl stands by the side of the road, greeting passing vehicles with a calloused thumb turned upward. She's tired. She wants to leave. But she knows she will come back.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Why?""
links.text: "Why?"

links.title: You: ""There are some... mysterious pinba..."
links.text: "There are some... mysterious pinball machines in some pretty... mysterious rooms in the Whirling..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yeah, and probably some ghosts fro..."
links.text: "Yeah, and probably some ghosts from the time of the Suzerain. I'm not really interested in supranatural mysteries."

links.title: You: ""Wait..." (wince from the pain) "wh..."
links.text: "Wait..." (wince from the pain) "what kinds of mysteries interest you, then?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Not murder mysteries, either, if t..."
links.text: "Not murder mysteries, either, if that's what you're thinking."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She looks you in the eye impassivel..."
links.text: She looks you in the eye impassively, making it clear that she's not planning to comment on the matter any further.

links.title: You: ""That's a shame... because I happen..."
links.text: "That's a shame... because I happen to be a para-natural detective."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Cool. They sent a ghost-cop after..."
links.text: "Cool. They sent a ghost-cop after me. Congratulations."

links.title: You: ""What about... elevators? Do you li..."
links.text: "What about... elevators? Do you like *elevators*?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""The fuck do elevators have to do w..."
links.text: "The fuck do elevators have to do with anything?"

links.title: You: ""Do you or don't you?!""
links.text: "Do you or don't you?!"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Not particularly.""
links.text: "Not particularly."

links.title: You: ""Why not?""
links.text: "Why not?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Why are *you* so hung up on elevat..."
links.text: "Why are *you* so hung up on elevators?"

links.title: Logic: "That's a pretty good question, actu..."
links.text: That's a pretty good question, actually. She clearly doesn't know anything about the secret passage.

links.title: You: ""Not even..." (grab your head) "qua..."
links.text: "Not even..." (grab your head) "quaint old rickety ones?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I'm not really into old shit for o..."
links.text: "I'm not really into old shit for old shit's sake."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Goddamnit..." The lieutenant grabs..."
links.text: "Goddamnit..." The lieutenant grabs his head.

links.title: Conceptualization: "So you know she's not an antiques e..."
links.text: So you know she's not an antiques enthusiast. Not my jurisdiction, man, but it also doesn't sound like she used that secret route. At all.

links.title: You: ""I think we may have gone a little..."
links.text: "I think we may have gone a little off-topic."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""And that topic was what? Staircase..."
links.text: "And that topic was what? Staircases? Ladders?"

links.title: You: ""Look, there's a... secret way from..."
links.text: "Look, there's a... secret way from the first floor of the Whirling to the roof."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Don't know it. But also..." She fr..."
links.text: "Don't know it. But also..." She frowns, studying your face.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Evaluating your competence as a pol..."
links.text: Evaluating your competence as a police officer.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""...the shot couldn't have come fro..."
links.text: "...the shot couldn't have come from the roof. Or we would have all heard it downstairs."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""She has a... point there. No one m..."
links.text: "She has a... point there. No one mentioned..." The pain stops him from finishing the sentence.

links.title: Suggestion: "That didn't go super well. You've g..."
links.text: That didn't go super well. You've gotta lay something better on her.

links.title: You: ""Okay then... I have other question..."
links.text: "Okay then... I have other questions for you."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I'm listening.""
links.text: "I'm listening."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No one takes a..." -- the lieutena..."
links.text: "No one takes a..." -- the lieutenant winces from the pain -- "fifteen-minute leak."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Look, fuck you, man. I might have..."
links.text: "Look, fuck you, man. I might have also stopped by the bar."

links.title: Drama: "She speaketh truth."
links.text: She speaketh truth.

links.title: You: ""They did say you left to take a......"
links.text: "They did say you left to take a... really long leak. Fifteen minutes."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yeah, and I'm sure they also made..."
links.text: "Yeah, and I'm sure they also made some FUNNY remarks about it -- they always do. I've driven a lot of long haul and chugged a lot of beer, man."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She scoffs. "Can't do either withou..."
links.text: She scoffs. "Can't do either without some power of mind over bladder. And, anyway, that wouldn't have been enough time."

links.title: You: ""There was... half an hour missing...."
links.text: "There was... half an hour missing. You went out..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Like *fuck* I did. I was *in* all..."
links.text: "Like *fuck* I did. I was *in* all the time -- I went for a leak, ten, fifteen minutes max."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""And?""
links.text: "And?"

links.title: You: ""Where did you get it?""
links.text: "Where did you get it?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""The gun store.""
links.text: "The gun store."

links.title: You: ""What gun store?""
links.text: "What gun store?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Trigger-Happy Jack's.""
links.text: "Trigger-Happy Jack's."

links.title: You: ""Really? Trigger...""
links.text: "Really? Trigger..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""What did you think? That I'm going..."
links.text: "What did you think? That I'm going to squeal on my gun supplier? Sorry, I'm not that kind of gal."

links.title: You: ""That doesn't... sound like the nam..."
links.text: "That doesn't... sound like the name of a real store."

links.title: You: ""I see it's a front-loader. Do you..."
links.text: "I see it's a front-loader. Do you have another... gun somewhere?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Sure don't.""
links.text: "Sure don't."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A breechloader?""
links.text: "A breechloader?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""No.""
links.text: "No."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "This is such a wipeout."
links.text: This is such a wipeout.

links.title: You: ""I can't quite tell... what *kind*..."
links.text: "I can't quite tell... what *kind* of gun is it?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""A Nachtwey 80 front-loader. Two-ba..."
links.text: "A Nachtwey 80 front-loader. Two-barrelled -- not really what you were looking for, I'm guessing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That... isn't... it...""
links.text: "That... isn't... it..."

links.title: Visual Calculus: "That merc was probably shot from a..."
links.text: That merc was probably shot from a distance with a military-grade rifle. Otherwise everyone at the Whirling would have heard the shot downstairs.

links.title: You: ""I know you don't like old things,..."
links.text: "I know you don't like old things, but do you... sell antique rifles on the side?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Never really got into weapons traf..."
links.text: "Never really got into weapons trafficking. Especially not old weapons -- they break too often, and you don't want unhappy customers among gun collectors."

links.title: You: ""Do you... collect guns... maybe ol..."
links.text: "Do you... collect guns... maybe old rifles?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""No, they're not practical. Break t..."
links.text: "No, they're not practical. Break too often."

links.title: Half Light: "A doubt creeps over you. She sounds..."
links.text: A doubt creeps over you. She sounds so sure of everything. So... not guilty.

links.title: You: "(Wince.) "There's other evidence I..."
links.text: (Wince.) "There's other evidence I want to ask you about." (Conclude.)

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yeah. *Evidence*.""
links.text: "Yeah. *Evidence*."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I considered her a good friend, ye..."
links.text: "I considered her a good friend, yeah."

links.title: You: ""Are you a... girl-liker?""
links.text: "Are you a... girl-liker?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""What the hell, man?!" She laughs...."
links.text: "What the hell, man?!" She laughs. "Yeah, why not? I've gotten worse."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Her hand slipped from the dial of t..."
links.text: Her hand slipped from the dial of the compressor for a moment, almost turning it down. Then she put her hand back -- not yet. Not yet...

links.title: You: ""Is peeping... one of your hobbies?""
links.text: "Is peeping... one of your hobbies?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Wow. Pissing, pinball, and now pee..."
links.text: "Wow. Pissing, pinball, and now peeping. I'm just not following your insinuations, detective."

links.title: You: ""There's a... hole in the wall. You..."
links.text: "There's a... hole in the wall. You can see into Klaasje's room... I wouldn't blame you if you've.."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""If I want to stare at a pretty gir..."
links.text: "If I want to stare at a pretty girl, I can pick one up at a bar -- or, worst case scenario, look at a naughty photo. Who has time to go skulking about the Whirling, drilling *holes* in walls?"

links.title: You: ""Klaasje looks like... a girl in on..."
links.text: "Klaasje looks like... a girl in one of your posters. She seems to be *your type*."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""My type? She's everyone's type. Sh..."
links.text: "My type? She's everyone's type. She's *your* type. Are you sure you're not the one who was excited about the peephole?"

links.title: You: ""Actually..." (grotesquely whine fr..."
links.text: "Actually..." (grotesquely whine from the pain) "I did get pretty excited..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Cool, man, cool. I'm glad you got..."
links.text: "Cool, man, cool. I'm glad you got off on it --  what the *fuck* are we talking about?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""What the fuck, man? She's everyone..."
links.text: "What the fuck, man? She's everyone's type. She's *your* type. Are you sure you're not the one who was excited about the peephole?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "She's beginning to suspect you've b..."
links.text: She's beginning to suspect you've broken into her lorry now.

links.title: You: ""So you *haven't* been.. watching K..."
links.text: "So you *haven't* been.. watching Klaasje through a hole in.. wall?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Nope. Look, she has an *effect* on..."
links.text: "Nope. Look, she has an *effect* on people -- or had, before you sent her off in your Moralintern meat grinder. It's impossible not to look at her when she walks into the room -- and very difficult to look away. But -- travel enough, and you realize..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""...for the same reason that she's..."
links.text: "...for the same reason that she's everyone's type as an object of desire, she's not irreplaceable."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Right on."
links.text: Right on.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Wrong. That kind of pussy is *never..."
links.text: Wrong. That kind of pussy is *never* replaceable.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Nope. Look, she has an *effect* on..."
links.text: "Nope. Look, she has an *effect* on people. That je ne sais quoi that makes it impossible not to look at her when she walks into the room -- and very difficult to look away. But -- travel enough, and you realize..."

links.title: You: ""Klaasje said... you may have used..."
links.text: "Klaasje said... you may have used the *peephole* in her wall to spy on her..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Damn. That girl's pretty, but not..."
links.text: "Damn. That girl's pretty, but not *that* pretty. In fact, no one's pretty enough to waste time skulking about the Whirling, drilling holes in walls..."

links.title: You: ""It's just, the hole in Klaasje's w..."
links.text: "It's just, the hole in Klaasje's wall is.. pretty suspicious..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Look, I'm not aware of any hole in..."
links.text: "Look, I'm not aware of any hole in Klaasje's wall. And if I had been, I would have told her to get it sealed -- that's what friends do."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I'm not following your clever insi..."
links.text: "I'm not following your clever insinuations, detective."

links.title: You: ""But you wanted to be more than jus..."
links.text: "But you wanted to be more than just *friends*."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Oh, so that's where you were going..."
links.text: "Oh, so that's where you were going with this."

links.title: You: ""She said you wanted to run... away..."
links.text: "She said you wanted to run... away with her."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""That's a very sentimental way of p..."
links.text: "That's a very sentimental way of putting it. We both had *pasts* we didn't want to catch up with us. And we enjoyed listening to music together. Why not go on a road trip?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Oh, so that's where you were going..."
links.text: "Oh, so that's where you were going with this." She shakes her head. "Do I *really* seem like someone who would do something as lame as committing murder out of jealousy?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant watches her expectan..."
links.text: The lieutenant watches her expectantly, occasionally shaking from the pain.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Okay, fine." She rolls her eyes. "..."
links.text: "Okay, fine." She rolls her eyes. "I was into her. Klaasje was into me too, for a time, I know it -- we even fooled around once. And, yeah, after that I thought maybe we could make a go of it."

links.title: Drama: "Klaasje only said they "maybe kisse..."
links.text: Klaasje only said they "maybe kissed". Someone is lying here.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "She touched that radiant beauty, th..."
links.text: She touched that radiant beauty, that silver wellspring of desire?

links.title: You: ""Wait -- Klaasje said you only kiss..."
links.text: "Wait -- Klaasje said you only kissed..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She rolls her eyes again. "If that'..."
links.text: She rolls her eyes again. "If that's what she wants on the record, so be it. I'm not about to go into details for you to jerk off to later."

links.title: Volition: "Seriously, just move on."
links.text: Seriously, just move on.

links.title: You: ""But I do want... details, actually..."
links.text: "But I do want... details, actually..." (Cringe from the head-splitting torment.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""...Really?""
links.text: "...Really?"

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Is that blood on the ground before..."
links.text: Is that blood on the ground before you? Are your ears *bleeding*?

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yeah, *really*?""
links.text: "Yeah, *really*?"

links.title: You: ""Okay... then what happened?""
links.text: "Okay... then what happened?"

links.title: You: ""Hold on, Klaasje only... likes tru..."
links.text: "Hold on, Klaasje only... likes truly buff men!"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""She does know how to pick 'em.""
links.text: "She does know how to pick 'em."

links.title: You: ""Then what happened?""
links.text: "Then what happened?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""She rejected me with some wishy-wa..."
links.text: "She rejected me with some wishy-washy bullshit about how she was confused because she felt so close to me and valued my friendship so much, and how guilty she felt for leading me on..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I knew that wasn't the whole story..."
links.text: "I knew that wasn't the whole story, but thought, fine, I'll take it and move on."

links.title: Empathy: "No ill will there. It wasn't a prob..."
links.text: No ill will there. It wasn't a problem for her.

links.title: You: ""Klaasje said you got very... angry..."
links.text: "Klaasje said you got very... angry when she started seeing Lely -- threatened her."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yeah, one time when we'd both been..."
links.text: "Yeah, one time when we'd both been drinking, I said some heated things about how dangerous her patterns with men were."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I was a little worried she'd blow..."
links.text: "I was a little worried she'd blow it out of proportion in her head -- all the drugs she was doing can make you feel like you're living in a Dolorian tragedy."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "By the way! Dolorian tragedies are..."
links.text: By the way! Dolorian tragedies are still held in high regard for innovation in language and motifs. They are also know for overwrought emotions leading to catastrophic outcomes.

links.title: You: ""And... despite everything, you hel..."
links.text: "And... despite everything, you helped her by staging the lynching?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yeah. The girl seemed terrified. T..."
links.text: "Yeah. The girl seemed terrified. The merc was beyond caring what happened to his mortal coil. It was a no-brainer."

links.title: You: ""There are... other things I... ask..."
links.text: "There are... other things I... ask about." (Conclude.)

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Go ahead -- it's your body.""
links.text: "Go ahead -- it's your body."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hngh...""
links.text: "Hngh..."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "And mine too, he thinks -- but keep..."
links.text: And mine too, he thinks -- but keep on. This must be done.

dialogueTree.title: You: ""Do you like to... hang out on roof..."
dialogueTree.text: "Do you like to... hang out on rooftops?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Who doesn't? Oh, you probably mean..."
links.text: "Who doesn't? Oh, you probably mean Klaasje's rooftop. Sure, I've hung out there. She's got this great antenna..."

links.title: You: ""Is that the only reason you... hun..."
links.text: "Is that the only reason you... hung out on the roof?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""The view's pretty bomb too, but yo..."
links.text: "The view's pretty bomb too, but you might say the antenna was the main attraction there, yeah. Along with Klaasje."

links.title: You: ""What's... so great about her anten..."
links.text: "What's... so great about her antenna?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""It's very powerful. I used it to t..."
links.text: "It's very powerful. I used it to tune into RCM frequencies. That's how I knew to be prepared for your arrival."

links.title: Pale Latitude Compressor: ""851023933... Come in...""
You: ""So you're... *sure* you didn't sho..."
links.text: "So you're... *sure* you didn't shoot the merc... from the roof?" (Move on.)

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yes, I'm sure." She pauses. "In fa..."
links.text: "Yes, I'm sure." She pauses. "In fact, the shot couldn't have possibly come from the roof -- otherwise we would have heard it downstairs."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmh... No one mentioned *hearing*..."
links.text: "Hmh... No one mentioned *hearing* any shots. And a rifle like the one used would have been *loud*. She's right... I don't think the shot came from... the roof."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yes, I'm sure. And, anyway, as I s..."
links.text: "Yes, I'm sure. And, anyway, as I said before, the shot had to have come from afar."

dialogueTree.title: You: ""Did you leave any... flowers for K..."
dialogueTree.text: "Did you leave any... flowers for Klaasje on the roof?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""No, gifts of flowers and candy are..."
links.text: "No, gifts of flowers and candy aren't really my style."

links.title: You: ""Not even wildflowers? May bell......"
links.text: "Not even wildflowers? May bell... for example?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She raises her eyebrows. "Nope.""
links.text: She raises her eyebrows. "Nope."

links.title: You: ""These weren't just flowers -- they..."
links.text: "These weren't just flowers -- they... symbols... of... Revolution." (Push through the pain.)

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""So now I'm leaving Revolutionary s..."
links.text: "So now I'm leaving Revolutionary symbols around... Come on."

links.title: Empathy: "Was that... pity? For you? She sees..."
links.text: Was that... pity? For you? She sees you're grasping for straws here.

links.title: You: ""But Klaasje was... mourning...""
links.text: "But Klaasje was... mourning..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I never did understand why, when s..."
links.text: "I never did understand why, when someone dies, a hothouse's worth of flowers has to die too."

links.title: You: ""Okay, so you... didn't leave May b..."
links.text: "Okay, so you... didn't leave May bells..." (Conclude.)

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""No, I did not.""
links.text: "No, I did not."

dialogueTree.title: You: ""You're running... drugs for the Un..."
dialogueTree.text: "You're running... drugs for the Union. I've been through your lorry."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""So, heart-of-gold Tommy fucked me..."
links.text: "So, heart-of-gold Tommy fucked me over too..." She shakes her head, slowly. "Never trust a musician."

links.title: Empathy: "That really comes as a blow to her."
links.text: That really comes as a blow to her.

links.title: Drama: "Maybe twist the knife? Just in case..."
links.text: Maybe twist the knife? Just in case. Make her more desperate.

links.title: You: ""Who's Tommy?""
links.text: "Who's Tommy?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""You know who he is -- he fucked me..."
links.text: "You know who he is -- he fucked me over. Country boy my ass..."

links.title: You: ""No, he didn't. I found my own way..."
links.text: "No, he didn't. I found my own way in." (Lie.)

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Okay, great, you got into my lorry..."
links.text: "Okay, great, you got into my lorry on your own. What now? You're going to arrest me for drug trafficking?" A bitter smile.

links.title: Empathy: "Beneath it, she's relieved Tommy di..."
links.text: Beneath it, she's relieved Tommy didn't betray her.

links.title: You: ""You're a... criminal. I can't trus..."
links.text: "You're a... criminal. I can't trust anything you say."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She scoffs. "That's your prerogativ..."
links.text: She scoffs. "That's your prerogative."

links.title: You: ""This means you're... already a kno..."
links.text: "This means you're... already a known killer. Because *drugs* kill people!"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Drugs don't make people abuse them..."
links.text: "Drugs don't make people abuse them; hopelessness does. As for the drug trade -- it would continue with or without me. I like to think that my efficiency as an organizer has at least prevented some internal conflicts."

links.title: Authority: "She's proud of her organizational a..."
links.text: She's proud of her organizational abilities even now -- and trying to raise that pride as a bulwark against the desperation.

links.title: You: ""You had... a financial incentive t..."
links.text: "You had... a financial incentive to kill the merc." (Move on.)

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Man, it's to get *away* from all t..."
links.text: "Man, it's to get *away* from all that murderous shit that I left the Madre for the Union."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hnghh..." The lieutenant is unable..."
links.text: "Hnghh..." The lieutenant is unable to articulate his question.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I got lucky being a dispatcher --..."
links.text: "I got lucky being a dispatcher -- never had to do any of the *really* dirty work myself. This gun," she glances at it, "has only been used for self-defence against serious scum." She turns the knob down just a millimetre.

links.title: You: ""But... you're threatening us with..."
links.text: "But... you're threatening us with it!"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Based on what I've heard about you..."
links.text: "Based on what I've heard about you -- you *are* serious scum," she responds, holding your gaze.

links.title: Half Light: "There's a sinister note in her voic..."
links.text: There's a sinister note in her voice. Even with the gun and the compressor, she's *afraid* of you.

links.title: You: ""I wish I... had my gun right now...""
links.text: "I wish I... had my gun right now..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Not for a moment do I believe that..."
links.text: "Not for a moment do I believe that *you* came here unarmed."

links.title: Half Light: "There's a sinister note in her voic..."
links.text: There's a sinister note in her voice. Even with the gun and the compressor, she's afraid of you.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "She's not letting her guard down."
links.text: She's not letting her guard down.

links.title: You: ""I wish... I could use my gun right..."
links.text: "I wish... I could use my gun right now."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""You won't get to. Your dirty littl..."
links.text: "You won't get to. Your dirty little tricks won't work with me," she responds, holding your gaze.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "There. It's going to be easier to r..."
links.text: There. It's going to be easier to reach the machine now.

links.title: Rhetoric: "She deliberately avoided naming the..."
links.text: She deliberately avoided naming the mob she worked for. You might be able to find this out later.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Man, it's to get *away* from all t..."
links.text: "Man, it's to get *away* from all that murderous shit that I left Jamrock -- my previous employer -- for the Union."

links.title: You: ""No, he didn't. I found my own way..."
links.text: "No, he didn't. I found my own way in."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I made him talk.""
links.text: "Yeah, I made him talk."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yeah, that figures." She shrugs. "..."
links.text: "Yeah, that figures." She shrugs. "What now? You're going to arrest me for drug trafficking?"

links.title: Composure: "She's more upset than she lets on."
links.text: She's more upset than she lets on.

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I made him talk." (Lie.)"
links.text: "Yeah, I made him talk." (Lie.)

dialogueTree.title: You: ""Okay, let's take a... step back."..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yeah? Where?""
links.text: "Yeah? Where?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yeah? Where?""
links.text: "Yeah? Where?"

links.title: Suggestion: "More. More questions before doing a..."
links.text: More. More questions before doing anything.

links.title: Half Light: "Damn it! Destroy that thing already..."
links.text: Damn it! Destroy that thing already!
